overview: The prolific director Chi Chi LaRue takes Matt Summers, a whole bunch of hot-n-heavily hung HOTTIES, and sets them in a school-like setting - all for the sole (and admirable) purpose of getting Matt to get deep-throated to the point of nearly choking to death.
tagline: Rascal Video exclusive, Matt Summers takes on the entire class and doesn't stop until he takes every last load all over his face!
title: Oral Exams
